paragraph.paragraph: For functions and procedures, you can build a formal argument list. You can do this by clicking on the New argument button as many times as you need arguments.
paragraph.note: Note: even though this dialog always shows parentheses, they are not generated if the list is empty (Eiffel's command-query separation (CQS) principle).
Note: if you add arguments to a routine, It is not possible anymore to select routine type once.
paragraph.paragraph:
For every attribute you selected, enter a name in the textbox and a type using the
80_type_selection.xml type selection .
